title: Highest PPG from other private creditors
description: In 2023, South Africa had the highest PPG from other private creditors, amounting to $750 million.

title: Fewest required tax meetings
description: In 2020, South Africa had the fewest required meetings with tax officials, averaging just 1 meeting for affected firms.

title: Highest unemployment with basic education
description: In 2023, South Africa had the highest unemployment rate for individuals with basic education, with 38.607% of the labor force affected.

title: Highest lower secondary school starting age
description: In 2023, South Africa had the highest starting age for lower secondary school, set at 14 years.
